dataset.title: IT_SI001137_20120719; Chemical Data of the water column in Lake Maggiore from 1981 to 2010

metadataProvider.organizationName: CNR - Istituito per lo Studio degli Ecosistemi

section.para: Dataset provides information about chemical data of the water column in Lake Maggiore from 1981 to 2010. In particular the data are on: Temperature, Conductivity, Alkalinity, Oxygen, PH, Total Phosphorus.

keywordSet.keyword: Permanent oligotrophic lakes, ponds and pools

para.literalLayout: Different methods are used according to the parameter measured, temperature and pH are mesaured during sampling with the autosampler; the other parameters are measured in the laboratory; Conductivity is referred to 20 °C; Total alkalinity determination is done with Gran's method; Dissolved oxygen is measured with Winkler's volumetric method; ; Spectrophotometry is used for Total Phosphorus after autoclave mineralization

methodStep.instrumentation: Reversing termometer associated with sampling bottle, Conductometer in laboratory, , autosampler (Gran's method), Titration, pHmeter, Spectrophotometer

section.para: Measurements are performed at 4 depths (0, 5, 10 and 20 m of the water column) and values are calculated as weighted average.
